{'Location': '#88/2,Richmond Road,, Bangalore City Center, Bangalore, India, 560025', 'overall_rating': '8.1', 'Name': 'The Elanza Hotel', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel at Posh Area but Food Quality bad‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel is good but the food quality was really bad as per standards. Green Tea Do Not Provide. 
Tea/coffee sachet they do not replenish in room until we call.
Dinner One day I took Chicken Tandoori which was not cooked well
2nd Day tried Veg - Paneer Tikka ( Hard Rubber Type ) and Paneer Paratha with no paneer in it with no pickle or Curd'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel is good but services need to improve ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is good .. staff is good but services need to improve '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel elanza‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good n nice'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best room in the world‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Absolute value for money, great location, no pool but doesnt matter, their rooms are better than some 7 star hotels'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Elenza‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice hotel. But hard to find electric switches as they are very tiny with very tiny letters. Toilet rolls are tiny and in the back, hard to reach. Air-conditioning temperature can not be adjusted.'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': '`how did this property get good reviews``?‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '1 Receptionist- didnt even say good evening, smile or help us in any way with explaining the layout of the hotel.
2 We booked the suite for 3 days -filthy sheets and pillow cases.
3 Minimal hangers, towels, glasses and toiletries
4 asked to see manager - never appeared despite giving reception photographic evidence of the bed linen 
5 minuscule light switches impossible to read and some did not relate to what they said
6 chipped and dirty mugs
7 Tv in bed area not working - fixed and only3 channels
8 Breakfast limited and the buffet closed sharp at 10 many guests missed out
9 GM nowhere around and reception often empty'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice Hotel + Good Location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The hotel is ideal for short stays and if your are only in the hotel to sleep.  Being a tech city there are key cards and touch switches however they are a nuisance as the panels don't work. You would need to call several times if you need a towel, cloths hanger or even water. Lacks warmth, very impersonal. There seems to be no senior person / manager around to guide the team or respond to our queries during our stay. "}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Not a Great Experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'There were number of issues as follows : 

1. Rooms are small and very compact.
2. There isn‚Äôt basic items provided in the room like coffee, milk, shampoo etc.
3. No staff available at reception most of the time.
4. Breakfast choice is not great as well.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good rooms and good location'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Location, Dated Building and Interiors ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location is great. Staff is very polite and helpful. Though the infrastructure is old and rooms are dated. Both elevators failed one after another within a span of 2 days. Breakfast buffet is very limited. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I really liked the room layout. Place is clean and room was well maintained.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Perfect location .
Cooperative staff.
Small rooms with almost all facilities.
Need to have phone near the lift on each floor for assistance in case room access is problem for the guests. 
Lighting in washroom can be improved. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very rude staff. The room service staff got angry when we asked for extra spoon!! Not recommended at all..'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very rude staff. The room service staff got angry when we asked for extra spoon!! Not recommended at all..'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'As of accommodation top notch with its location and ambience and breakfast could be improved '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': ' Fantastic place to stay in city center of Bangalore‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It is well located in the Richmond Road which is in the city center itself but not that many disturbances of the traffic. All major attractions are of more or less of equal distance. We parked our car in the hotel and went to the city by Uber or Auto, otherwise parking will be an issue in the city. Hotel staff are very friendly. Breakfast is decent but limited, unfortunately the same menu is repeating every day. The main attendant in the restaurant was very friendly and helping. Rooms are adequately spacious, since they smart electrical switches it is little bit difficult to identify in the first time. I will definitely choose the same hotel when I visit Bangalore next time.
Suggestions
*Avoid travelling in peak time traffic from 8.30 am to 10 am and 4.30 pm to 6.30 pm
*If you wish to go for shopping, the ideal place is Jayanagar 4th block where you can find out vendors matching all price tags. Avoid the so called ‚ÄúCommercial Street‚Äù, all items available there are of cheap quality.
Cons : 
*Wi Fi password changing daily or more than once in a day, which is inconvenient.
*Water pressure in the toilet is too high (room no. 414)
*Parking space is limited (for 3 or 4 cars only), remaining cars they are parking in the next property.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Would be better‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Would be better'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Not the best‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Can choose to stay if options are limited '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'A good hotel with worst service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Don‚Äôt expect service or attendance from the staff. They do not care for customer or customer voice.
However the hotel is good and is at good location.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Very Good hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I had been here with my husband and daughter and i must say the hotel was really pleasant and was located in a very decent area. Only i would like to request the staff to kindly update on breakfast menu everyday. Otherwise i enjoyed my stay and would recommend others too. It would be nice if they can improve the standard of the rooms or reduce the price.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Clean and Comfortable Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's worth visiting this hotel as it all all the amenities and facilities located inside."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'It‚Äôs really good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff the room were too good\nOverall experience 9/10'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Did Not Like my Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The wifi is Awful . They give you a coupon which is valid for 1 day. The internet speed using this coupon is extremely bad and disconnects automatically. They will tell you that they will generate a coupon code for faster internet and will send to your room which they NEVER WILL. You need to go and followup them. Also it will work for only 2 people (devices). So if you are a group of 3 better luck arguing with these guys because all you will hear is it‚Äôs not possible. Worst guest experience and the staff is clearly undertrained. They had the audacity to tell ‚ÄúGo bring your device downstairs to the reception and I will connect the internet‚Äù I mean who the hell says that?? How a Guest is supposed to go up and down? They need to come up and fix it. It‚Äôs ridiculous. Also the best part is hot water. Better luck getting HOT WATER in the evening. This hotel misses basic needs. It‚Äôs a BIG NO. I would not even think of staying in this hotel again. 4 Star hotel ‚òïÔ∏è  üòÇ'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Bad location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Me and my girlfriend were walking along the road to a shop and the men were just disgusting. Luckily our hotel was close by so we went back and took the car"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel with friendly staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I had a great time staying at Zion. {'Location': 'ITPL Main Road Phase 2, Plot No 1 , Green Avenue Layout ,  Opp Kundalahalli Colony, Whitefield, Bangalore, India, 560037', 'overall_rating': '9.2', 'Name': 'Bloom Hotel - Brookefield', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Not worth to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This hotel is only meant for one day stay or for any corporate paid stays. Not value for money. Facilities are poor like no bathroom door mats, bathroom amenities are not working, no complimentary breakfast'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This was my second stay at Bloom Hotel - Brookefield. Great staff, very helpful and friendly. They were also accomodating of my request to check-in early. The rooms are spotlessly clean. Great job there!! Keep up the good work. My only critique if any would be to have a fully functional restaurant for lunch and dinner, but I was given to understand that it would be up and running next month. On the whole, a comfortable stay no complaints.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel with not so good food‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is new and clean. But the food is not good and safe.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice place to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Clean, nice spacious'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice one‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'nice location'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for Money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Clean Rooms, best facilities and good staff. Good location. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best & Newest Budget Hotel in B‚Äôluru !!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Easily the best no-frills budget hotel in all of B‚Äôluru. Tried out based on google reviews & wasn‚Äôt disappointed one bit. A new property, which has been in existence for 8 months now. Cozy ambiance, vibrant yellow aesthetics, spacious rooms, decent amenities, delectable food (buffet has substantial variety for the budget offered), super swift room service / response time, complimentary soft drinks & extremely amicable, efficient and competent staff. Would like to call out Irshad, Shivraj, Rajkumar, Sneha & Nakul from front desk. Shambu & Mantu from Security. Pradeep from Room Service. Hotel is easily accessible for cabs/rick and close to ITPL main road pubs, restaurants and shops. Do not miss this gem of a place if your priority is budget, comfort, hygiene, facilities & safety. Kudos and keep up the great work !!'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel is in a good location, staffs  were helpful and friendly. The service was  good and our stay was relaxing. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best in all forms‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff is very courteous and forthcoming, the rooms are small but extremely clean, i like to book a hotel based on how the toilets are, and i was pleasantly surprised that the bathrooms were spic and span, rooms can do with fan but otherwise the experience was amazing '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Stay was excellent '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A super cozy hotel and in a great locality. Staffs and security are really helpful and go out of their way to make your stay comfortable. Rooms are compact but super clean and hygienic. There is a car parking at the basement which can accommodate 5-6 cars at max. Had a wonderful experience 5/5. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best for the budget'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good clean hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Only issue was the wifi flakiness'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Well maintained ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is well maintained. Staff are very courteous. Food and breakfast spread can be improved. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Modern Practical And Very Cosy‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A cosy place with lots of sunshine yellow, clean rooms and comfortable beds,  it has furniture and fittings which have been thoughtfully chosen for practical use. This ensures  a clutter free environment where the available space is utilized very well. Room service is good. And my brother and i had a very tasty lunch ,  but possibly due to the nice weather and a consequent late start of activities, a steaming pot of filter coffee we were yearning for did not get delivered ! '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great hotels‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Bloom is one the best stay wih clean and equipped rooms'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent service ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent service '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing value ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is a hidden gem in Bangalore! I was pleasantly surprised to find this place and had a wonderful stay. The place is so clean, the bathrooms are brand new, the linens are soft and new, and it was such a comfortable stay. The restaurant was really good. The staff went out of their way to make my meals personalized for my taste. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Clean and new‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel property was new and was very clean when I visited. Cons:
Random policy - no guests after 7pm
Charges for some basic requests - for eg we ordered some extra spoons and they said it will be chargeable'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Facilities grossly lacking for a business hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I booked a Club room(which is their premium room) which was supposed to have much larger space but it is misleading as they include the balcony space and the actual room is the same size(which is pretty small). The view or balcony is nothing to enjoy. Basic facilities like Iron/Ironing board, Refrigerator etc. are not provided! Besides that, they try to charge you for everything(like extra cutlery, wine glasses) etc! Most disappointing was the cable TV service is very basic and doesn't include CNN/CNBC or any other regional language options. I offered to pay extra for it but they had no way of supporting it! During office hours, it is extremely difficult to get into hotel if you come from the opposite side. You will have to snake your way into the exit entrance and get into the hotel! Find it disconcerting....perhaps they should revers the exit and entry gates(gave that as a feedback!).

Staff is friendly, food options are good. "}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I landed at the hotel at 11.15 am, well before the check in time, which was 2.00 pm. I was asked to wait for sometime as reportedly the rooms that were getting vacated were being cleaned. The check out time was 11.00 am. 
By noon I was allotted room 505 on the fifth floor. The room had no windows. Hence no natural light at all. The room shared a common wall with the restaurant which was also on the same floor. The noise from the kitchen was unbearable. The whole day and night was a torture. When I mentioned this in the reception in the evening they said that they allotted room 505 as no other room was available, which is not true. This was a very conscious decision to allot room 505 as it‚Äôs been booked at a discounted rate through Agoda. 
For all those planning to stay here, please seek a confirmation that your room is not on the 5th floor and that it has a window, lest you also suffer like I did. '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location makes up for novice staff - can be one better with experienced staff or more training '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Ê∏ÖÊΩî„Å™ÈÉ®Â±ã‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '„Éõ„ÉÜ„É´ÂÜÖ„ÅØ„Å®„Å¶„ÇÇÊ∏ÖÊΩî„Åß„Éô„ÉÉ„Éâ„É°„Ç§„Ç≠„É≥„Ç∞„ÇÇ‰∏ÅÂØß„ÄÇ'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'nice'}], 'price': '3,058', 'img_link': 'https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/840x460/243490612.jpg?k=1a5a7de0969db88b843b0487a5e1430111cdbdd85290347fdc8dac2d09057486&o=', 'room_size': '17m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Alarm clock', 'Hand sanitizer', 'Linens', 'Wake-up service', 'Trash cans', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities', 'Fire extinguisher', 'Individual air conditioning', 'In-room safe box', 'Locker', 'Safety/security feature', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Bangalore', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/bloomroom-cunninghamroad/hotel/bangalore-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=6&los=1&searchrequestid=fedc1d8f-f788-4eb5-94f4-f1651748d48b'}

I think a bar would have really been a great addition.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not all staff are professional to say the least'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Not good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I was staying there so it would be easier for me to catch a flight from Bangalore airport early next day, but the Hotel seems to have many unnecessary rules

1. Hotel menu is small, which is ok, so i odered from Zomato but apparently, you'll have to walk down to the reception every time to receive your order. What can't the hotel staff deliver it to your room? You'll expect that such things will be taken care of when you are paying 4.5k a day

2. I checked in  the evening, so wanted to order some tea around 8 or 8:30, but when i tried to place my order with the hotel kitchen, they said it's dinner time :D. So, they'll try to see if tea can be arranged for.

3. I was staying there on 31st December and asked them to put the tea in a kettle so that it stays warm but surprise surprise..they didn't have a kettle.

4. You will not be able to book a taxi from Uber or Ola to the Airport. There is a toll nearby and none of the driver will accept the ride. At the last moment, you'll have to pay Rs 700 whereas Uber was showing just 250. 
(of course, this is not a negative point for the Hotel)

Hotel is neat and clean and there isn't a problem in that regard.

It's just that their service is not up to par.
"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Fgh'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Shivas is strategically located near the airport. The room service and cleaning staff where very helpful.

'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Unbelievable aggressive male staff ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I appologize for the long story, but I have to write this review. 

I came to stay in India for a long time because I was about to undergo difficult surgery in Bangalore.
I had gotten an email confirmation from the staff that an early check in and a spacious room with balcony was avaiting me.
I also asked for airport transfer.

The "transfer taxi" Astris sent was an increadibly old dirty private car where the door didn't close properly of which they charged me full price. 
I should have called an Uber. üòâ

When I finally arrived at Astris they had no room ready and tried to put me in the smallest darkest room I have ever seen.
After 18 hours flight and as a 50+ woman traveling alone with injuries the staffs welcoming was not ok.
I refused the room and they had me waiting in the lobby from 10 to 3. 
I was sitting and sleeping in an armchair in the lobby without being offered breakfast or even water to drink.
They didn't care at all. 

After all that waiting at least they gave me a big apartment suite as "a complimentary" which was very much to my liking.
After that I enjoyed my stay and extended several times.
I did nothing but travel back and forth to the hospital for examinations every single day for weeks. 
I made clear to the head staff of the front desk that I wanted to extend my stay for 6 more weeks and that a private nurse would also come to live with me after my surgery.
I asked if I could get a better price for staying so long, but got the rude answer that "a hotel is no charity". 

Same night the front desk told me to extend for an extra night through Agoda.
I don't remember why. 
I was very tired but managed to do the booking and went to take a shower. 
After a little while complete hell broke loose. The phone never stopped ringing and then they started knocking on the door. 
I didn't answer until I got out of the bathroom, then I called the front desk wondering what on earth was going on.
I was met with a horrible attitude by the same man who I had told '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Great property ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great location, good food, and very clean and comfortable.'}], 'price': '4,064', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/255/255853/255853_16091613110046534448.jpg?ca=13&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '28m¬≤', 'amenities': ['City view', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Shared bathroom', 'Executive lounge access', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Additional toilet', 'Bathrobes', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'DVD/CD player', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Mobile hotspot device', 'On-demand movies', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Adapter', 'Air conditioning', 'Daily newspaper', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Slippers', 'Soundproofing', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Refrigerator', 'Desk', 'Fireplace', 'Interconnecting room(s) available', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Trash cans', 'Window', 'Wooden/parqueted flooring', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities', 'Sewing kit', 'Fire extinguisher', 'Individual air conditioning', 'In-room safe box', 'Laptop safe box', 'Locker', 'Safety/security feature', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Bangalore', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/melange-astris/hotel/bangalore-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=fedc1d8f-f788-4eb5-94f4-f1651748d48b'}

Parking: Huge parking space available no problem at all.

No Touch Check and Check out: Check-in and Check out were smooth, No touch, Social distancing was maintained.

Room: Big enough, TV was small 32 inches, Neat and clean linen, washroom and wardrobe.

Bed: Although small, but good enough for two people.

Electricals: AC, Fridge, FAN everything is in good working condition, no issue.

Restaurant & Food: I took two meals (Breakfast and Dinner) both were Buffet, although not many guests, still maintained it.

Staff: The plus point is the staff, reception guy, people in the restaurant, especially Zhale and preetesh were kind enough, I asked them to customize meals for me, and they did it happily. In fact next day Zhale asked me to get it customized again. These small gestures make a big impact.

Cleaning doesn‚Äôt happen daily like in other hotels. If you need inform at the desk. Good , that you won‚Äôt expect any disturbance and your valubles will be locked.

Washing machine on 6th floor. No coins just use. Bring your own washing powder.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Olive "by Embassy" a hoax!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We booked a room at Olive Indiranagar for 3 nights and 2 days and tbh this experience easily made it to the top of our worst experience at hotels list. First of all, there was no ringer or telephone in the room to contact the reception or room service. We had to leave our rooms time and again if we needed assistance. Exceptionally small room for the price that they charge and staff was utterly rude and refused to provide us with packaged drinking water and implied that we should use the water dispenser. 
Secondly, even though it said free wifi in amenities, the wifi here could only be accessed by maximum 2 devices. It took the staff more than a day to help us with the wifi username and correct password.
Third, the water at this hotel contains so much chemicals or God knows what that it left our skin dehydrated and rough. Our eyes started burning and itching when it came in contact with the water here.
I would suggest anyone who is planning to make a booking here to look elsewhere for the price you're willing to pay. The hotel management can do better at customer experience and provide better services. The experience we had at Olive was an absolute disappointment. 2. It is in Indiranagar which makes it easy to access the party places over there plus a stones throw away to MG road which is great as well
3. The staff is so curteous. Didnt find issue with them even once. 
4. Vending machine at the hotel where you get a lot of options 
5. Connectivity is a big plus
6. Security is strong so no fear


Negatives - 
1. Cheaper version of bloomrooms
2. There is no kitchen, there is an app via which you can order so that was not nice
3. Old rooms, won't give you a luxurious feel but nontheless it was quite nicely maintained

I had two major issues, one that the front desk staff were not aware of their own policies, and secondly, that I saw many dead bees outside after the morning mosquito spray. Mgmt assured me they are addressing both. On an interesting note, I got upset with front desk staff for not knowing their own policies because it caused me delays, and inconvenience  - especially after I confirmed multiple times. Both staff members did not they lose their cool for a second. I would promote both of them after they learn all the hotel policies and procedures, because people with that level of calm absolutely belong in hospitality.  The front desk should be more heavily staffed. It's the only area of hotel that is lacking and one that is quite important. "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I stayed at the oberoi bengaluru before in 2018 and was amazed by the outstanding service and the friendliness of the staff, as well as the Beauty of the hotel.

'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Great location and well maintained rooms‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'For those who like a bustling tourist environment when you step out of the hotel, this is a great choice to stay. Located bang on the landmark Brigade road off of the MG Road, its surrounded by Pubs, Restaurants, Brand stores and malls.

I visit Bengaluru a couple of times in a year for official purpose and have been staying here most of my trips for the last 7 years. I usually request for one of two room choices I have stayed in past and and have observed they are well maintained and look the same in each visit. The bathrooms are small but are clean and show some signs of aging.

In the heart of South Bangalore, close to Lal Bagh, 4th Block complex, ample shopping and restaurants nearby.

However if you're travelling with your family (We travelled with our infant and 4 year old) and have young kids then this isn't the hotel for you. The rooms are tiny. We had a studio and still felt very cramped.  Agoda website lists the beds as King but they are smaller than a traditional queen bed. We got a rollaway cot and the room was full to the brim. The shower door wouldn't close all the way and leaked water on the floor. The AC units worked well but wouldn't filter the smoke or odors from the kitchen. 

The hotel GM waived the fee for extra cot and assured that he would look into the AC. All in all, excellent service but not for families with young kids."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'very conveniently located. Got a small shower gel and had to request for couple of more, especially when you travel with family but they say provision is for just one but accepted to send one more.

At dining room, staff may greet and attend to particular people and may ignore you which needs rectified.

Food is really delicious and served hot.

The only issue about the room, important enough to mention here, was the appointments in the bathroom and kitchen. It was very poorly stocked. 
The restaurant, while good, is EXTREMELY slow. We ordered dinner one evening, and had to wait about an hour for the first batch of food, and subsequent 15 mins for the next 2 batches - all for some rotis, a couple entrees and some fried rice. All came one dish at a time, with my beer being delivered AFTER I was already done with dinner. 

Besides the fiasco with the restaurant, this is truly a very good place to stay. Would defiantly recommend. Had sought a non-smoking room but although they confirmed that the same was provided, the room had the unpleasant smell of cigarettes. The room freshener never arrived. To top it all off, the AC was not working and despite three attempts, the local technician couldn't / didn't address it. Since this was the base room, the windows opened to the wall of the adjacent building and that too couldn't be opened. Overall, the stay was not pleasant and the reception was uninterested in resolving these mentioned issues. I can certainly say for every reasonable ask you do, you will not be charged extra.

They do not have twin beds even though we explicitly requested for it (I even called the OYO helpline to check if they have it and I was assured that they do).

{'Location': 'No 2/55 Outer Ring Road, Nagavara, RT Nagar, Bangalore, India, 560045', 'overall_rating': '8.7', 'Name': 'Courtyard by Marriott Bengaluru Hebbal', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'no value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'such a tiny room for 11k.not worth it at all. and the breakfast was very average'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Friendly Staffs‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Will stay again'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Staycation ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Had a best time off for a day at Courtyard Hebbal Marriott is class part. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Pleasant Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Recommend for family with children'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Chef is great people are considerate room is clean and food is good'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Courtyard Marriott Hebbal Bengaluru‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Loved the stay @ Marriott!'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Clearly need to educate front staff of how to use a computer‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The front staff was not able to find my booking, as well as how I was treated at the restaurant for the morning breakfast was pathetic. I am not happy with the way things went , and would have expected it to be a better experience coming from the Marriott Group of hotels.

Please see that future customers don't have to go through the same unfornate experiences that I have had."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Professional service yet delivered with such warmth‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I was received very welcoming by the guest relations officer and they even assisted me with OLA/Uber booking when I was facing difficulties getting to office. The concierge and security will even assist to direct the driver to the hotel as at times the location drop on GPS is not accurate.  

One of the server at the Hebbal cafe is so meticulous he even remembered on my 3rd day I will always order black tea and my colleague order is warm water.

{'Location': 'No,1, 5th Main Road, West of chord, Rajaji nagar, Bangalore, Bangalore City Center, Bangalore, India, 560010', 'overall_rating': '6.9', 'Name': 'Istay Hotels Rajajinagar', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Waste of money and You will face health issue for sure.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We stayed for 2 days here, we booked the room in Agoda and we paid the money earlier so we don't have any choice to check out the room or get the money back so we need to stay. 
 Worst place I have ever stayed giving a lot of money. Photos displayed on the website are clean and fresh but in actuality, it has many negatives.
1. Lot of dust - Get a health issue guaranty. 
2. Cockroach - Rooms are full of cockroaches.
3. Lack of hygiene 

The only good thing is the staff and cleaners, we faced all the above issues so we informed them for a change of room they have shifted us to a different room but that room was also in the same condition. The next day we visited other rooms in the lodge but all are the same. 

So finally the conclusion is this hotel is not good at all. We faced dust allergy because of the stay here. Next, it is left to you.
"}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Overnight stay is ok not for longer daysr ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Amenities 
Room is small but it has basic amenities -coffee maker,milk powder, two glasses,towels,air conditioning, small soap,handwash

Extra pillow 
Provided an extra pillow when asked 

Ok for overnight stay 

Small room
Don't book if you are claustrophobic or have issues with room without windows.This room don't have windows.You will not get sunlight so you will not know the timings from the light.So donot forget to keep your alarm .

Check out
Beware of the check out timings .It ends at 12 noon no matter whatever time you check in

I checked in at 6 pm the previous day but the check out time still stays the same .It will be 12 pm the next day.Beware of that.
The receptionist called me at 12 noon to inform this.So I had to rush back and check out.So check with reception on that

Travel 
If you want to travel take Uber or Rapido -it will be cheaper -otherwise it will be higher.Better don't ask for help from others and you will end up paying a hefty price to them.Or ask how much is the charge is in the beginning.

Delivery to room
I made a swiggy order.Happy that they delivered it to the room.

Hotwater
The hotwater is available from 5:30 am to 12 noon .It is not available for 24 hours .But if you call reception and request for hot water they can help.

Bathroom ventilation 
The bathroom had stuffy air eventhough they had ventilation.

Lift facility 
There is lift .You have to get in from one side and get out from the other side.The staff helped with the luggage.
Request them.

I don't think there is a wheelchair for special needs but lift was working.

Two water bottles without charge
Two water bottles were given free of charge

Overall recommendation 
Overall I would recommend you to stay if you are ok with small room and without windows.Air conditioning was working. Beware of check out timings .Check with reception.

"}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Ok if youre‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Ok if you're travelling for work and alone. 
The rooms are a bit conjusted but ok for a sleepover at night"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'aWeSoMe sTaY‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great place to stay if in Rajajinagar.  Room and Cleanliness was good, Accessible to many malls, temples and other places in West Bangalore..

Very old hotel with old furnitures. Photo given in the site are misleading ( very old photos or photoshopped).

Room was smelly, bath room was stinking (room 401). Bath towel was old, dirty, oily and ragged. Bed sheets were not clean and was stained.

Drinking water was not available in the room. Could get only multiple phone calls. Plug socket to recharge the mobile near the bed was not working.

Breakfast was okay. There was no water at hand wash after breakfast. They instructed to wash hands with water bottle. 

Room was expensive, not worth money.  We went to Bangalore for a wedding and booked this hotel since it was close to the wedding location . This experience spoiled the mood of every one and have decided will never stay in this hotel and never book again on Agoda.'}], 'price': '1,389', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/555/555444/555444_13121918050017938014.jpg?ca=13&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '28m¬≤', 'amenities': ['City view', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Lowered electrical outlet', 'Non-slip grab bar', 'Accessible toilet', 'Hair dryer', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Walk-in shower', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Reading light', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Blackout curtains', 'Concierge', 'Fan', 'Hand sanitizer', 'Linens', 'Private entrance', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Soundproofing', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Mini bar', 'Refrigerator', 'Desk', 'Laptop workspace', 'Seating area', 'Sofa', 'Trash cans', 'Window', 'Wooden/parqueted flooring', 'Closet', 'Clothes dryer', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities', 'Exterior corridor', 'Accessible by elevator', 'Accessible by stairs', 'Fire extinguisher', 'Individual air conditioning', 'In-room safe box', 'Locker', 'Safety/security feature', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Bangalore', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/mango-hotels-prajwal/hotel/bangalore-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=6c0ec3b9-1ef0-4a35-8c12-ca4039bda83e'}

'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location and staff with money crunch management‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I visited this place post pandemic. I was travelling with my younger brother. We requested an early checkin as our flight reached at 9 and we reached hotel by 10. They said its subject to availability, which is ok. After waiting for 3 hours in lobby we got our room we enter the room and keep our bags and head out for meeting our friends after coming back we turn on the ac put it on 22 degrees, after an hour still it was boiling hot in our room, we called reception they sent someone he checked the whole ac and said nothings wrong with it and leaves. We call again at 2 as its unbearable sleeping in an ac room with no fans and ac not working again they come and check. Same thing, i got restless and complaint to get my room changed, the guy requested that there are no rooms available we'll try and change tomorrow. And for us to not feel hot he gave us stand fan in the room. Next day in afternoon we changed our room. This time the ac was better but still considering outside temp it was still warm. The staff said in confidence to me that management has pre set the ac temps. The don't go lower than that to save electricity. So we stayed in a hotel we paid for with ac, but with a warm room. Breakfast was also very bad. Considering we're in a place famous for dosas their dosas were also tasted horrible. Staff was very polite and friendly especially the darbaan a very friendly and helpful person ( he helped us a lot with talking to cab and rickshaw drivers, but in the end the whole experience was ruined by the management bad money saving tricks as we didn't have comfortable stay due to our rooms being super warm"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Spacious well appointed rooms and a very good buffet breakfast.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Breakfast timing are not flexible.. and also took money twice because system was not working.. yet to refund one of them.. hopefully they would'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The place is well maintained with a good restaurant. Never had such a bad experience. Sharing this as per my experience.
Location: Just opposite of IFB factory. Metro construction is going on entire stretch, which make the ride to Hotel unbearable (not Hotel's fault though).
Rooms: Rooms were partial tidy and out dated. WC had hairs on it, which means it was not cleaned properly. Internet speed is ok. DTH was not working, had to change the box both days. Called at Recp for room preference, acknowledge over phone, but room was diff. Next day room was changed, but it was for handicapped. (It had low sink, low WC). Bed were not comfortable, had a doubt of Bed bug bites on skin on arms and back (still give benefit of doubt to Hotel that this is taken care of as basic hygiene) Cups were not clean.
Breakfast: Very Limited option but here staff is supportive. Served Dosa which was delicious. My Fellow traveller ordered Parantha and Uttapam, which took more than usual time. (still no complaints).

I ll give 2/5 star to this property and will not consider or recommend to stay.

'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Cockroach Infestation Issue‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Vihaari Hotel has the potential to shine but their light is dimmed by their reluctance to acknowledge, accept and FIX their ongoing cockroach infestation issue! I am a renowned artiste and had stayed there for almost 2 weeks. Each day of those 2 weeks, I tried my best to put up with the issue, hoping they would take some serious actions to curb it. But every time I called the reception for help, all they did was send a staff up with a bug medicine to place on the floors and corners. I told them that this does not help and that the cockroaches are still appearing. I was unable to eat or sleep in peace! They did not accept that there was an infestation issue till the end. I ended up cancelling my entire stay and choosing to leave as I have insect allergies and I could not tolerate the lack of hygiene and lack of accountability by management. The basement of the hotel is trashy and damp. The drain holes are massive and leaving a pathway for the infestation to thrive in the rooms. I hope that the hotel will take accountability and do something to STOP this infestation instead of denying that there is a problem. They will do better, if they stepped up to this. It's such a pity.

{'Location': 'Nagarabhavi Main Rd, Bangalore City Center, Bangalore, India, 560072', 'overall_rating': '8.1', 'Name': 'Myspace Dhruva Inn', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Average. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'They got most of the basics right, except for us initially going through a horribly smelling room stinking with smell of tobacco, they did change the room right away though. 

The rooms were neat and tidy, as well as the washrooms except for the towels. The water supply in the entire building has inconsistent pressure and suddenly changes back and forth, so careful while using the sink with the tap fully open. 

The only con, funnily enough, is that this has to be first hotel in my entire travel experience that charged us for a bottle of drinking water because we requested it on the check out day. I checked in late night at around 1 am and paid the full amount, so the water bottle part was weird. Breakfast was average, the good or the tea/coffee wasn‚Äôt even warm enough in such a cold weather. 

Pretty average stay over all though. The big man at the reception needs to be a bit more pleasant with the customers though, the lady was handling it better. '}], 'price': '2,170', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/32360774/0/03e96b8adf90ecdf2fcc5adbc3cfa942.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '17m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Smoking allowed', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Concierge', 'Daily newspaper', 'Hand sanitizer', 'Linens', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Trash cans', 'Accessible by elevator', 'Accessible by stairs', 'Fire extinguisher', 'First aid kit', 'Individual air conditioning', 'In-room safe box', 'Safety/security feature', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Bangalore', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/myspace-dhruva-inn/hotel/bangalore-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=6f5572d4-6ef0-475a-983a-349d9a48b5e6'}

The breakfast was good . The location is very far. Overall for the price it is not good enough."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Bed was comfortable and breakfast was delicious!'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Fantastic staff and service but not a 5 star hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I have stayed in Marvella few times and always enjoyed the comfortable rooms and the fantastic staff that make the stay a great one each time.

That said, I am having a hard time justifying this as a true '5-Star' hotel and feel it is over priced just for that reason.

Pros:
- Great and attentive staff. Not only they very quickly resolve minor issues but clearly close the loop and checkin with the guests about the satisfaction of the resolution.
- Unbeatable location! It is steps away from Metro and walkable to bustling Jayanagar shopping area and pretty much accessible from most parts of the city
- The room cleanliness is maintained well, again testament to great staff

Cons, and the reasons I do not believe this is a 5-Star hotel and hence is overpriced:
- Cheap toiletry. The kind of soaps used by a hotel is a clear give away of their Star status and here Marvella falls flat right off the gate! I don't believe the shower gel they put in teh showers is even healthy, it looks that cheap! Overall ho-hum 3-Star quality toiletries
- The breakfast is super boring! It is the same menu rotated everyday with one or two predictable variants (one south indian breakfast item and the dessert at the cereal stand). The music in the restaurant is loud and tacky Bollywood instrumentals. While the staff do well, the maitre'd seems clueless about their role and is seen meandering about aimlessly with not much greeting or help to guests.
- The wi-fi is super slow, and slower than a public library! In this day and age when most travellers carry at least 3 devices, their 2 device limit seems like the 1990's (as does their speed).
- There are no bell boy service, it feels odd that the reception office staff double duty as bell boys. Which would be OK, except if they claim 5-star status, they should provide 5-Star service

As mentioned above, on the whole I liked my stay at Marvella, but it does bother me they claim 5-Star status and pricing, but fall short on some obvious cases where th"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'very good '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good experience in a great location!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Bed was so comfortable and location of the hotel is close to Jayanagar and very convenient to commute!'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superb Hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great Hotel, great ambience, great facilities '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice stay but communication is an issue‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's a great place to stay but for the first timer communication is an issue with auto rickshaw and even cab."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good but not worth the price ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The room ceiling height is low, location advantage is the plus side. We celebrated my spouse's bday in the hotel - must say, every aspect of the hotel was exceptional and everyone in the hotel was aiming to make the stay comfortable. Right from the reception, front desk,  dining, room service spa or concierge - we received a great service. Especially during COVID period, we were sceptical but the concerns were fully addressed when we saw the level of care and precaution being taken by the hotel. I would highly recommend a stay here. Special mention to Mahesh Narayan, Apratim, Surya, Chef Satish, Maanvik, Sweata, Shweta, Diksha,  Mr. Pavan and the whole concierge team for your efforts, service and great hospitality. "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Oustanding hotel !! ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I dont usually give reviews but i feel compelled to write one as per our experience during our short stay at the Ritz Carlton Bangalore. The hotel is nothing short of spectacular. From the moment we arrived at the airport and until our arrival at the hotel, everything was a breeze. We travelled as a family of 4 with two young children for a short  Diwali holiday and we got exactly what we needed from our much needed break which is extra care , attention and relaxation. Our children in particular enjoyed so much as their staff is very accommodating and always go out of their way in order for us to feel comfortable. We also enjoyed the pool, hair saloon and spa. All were equally excellent as well.

I also feel the need to mention a few names that had been amazing to us throughout our stay, Ms Megha who works in housekeeping had notice we were using the bed runner as a prayer mat so she provided us with one (we thought this was so thoughtful and considerate of her) she even gave the kids chocolates!  Ms Devyani from the Bang, bar also is also an exceptionally sweet and a very cheerful person. She is always looking out for us making sure we our needs were attended and also presented the kids with chocolates! (Bless her).Lastly, Mr Jem from The Market restaurant is a superb gentleman. We were so delighted by his outstanding service.

Overall, this has to be the best hotel in Bangalore and if not the whole of India in terms of their service and facilities. Will definitely come back again soon! 

Muhammad '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent service and hospitality!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Extremely good service and thorough screening of guests and visitors for security measures.
Amenities wise, don't be too hopeful as there are no malls or convenience stores near the hotel.
Room is very pretty and once again, impeccable service!"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Clean, friendly staffs, big rooms, location at city centre. It's mostly quite and serene .
The room is good value for money with clean linen and Home like Towels , beddings and even a bucket un the bathroom ..the staff is like our Support staff at home and one can even cook your own breakfast or they can cook for you.. they do have a very basic buffet which is included in the package. For breakfast 
Soft spoken and polite staff  and quite place and serene ambience in the middle of the city..
I would definitely go back
"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent place and great location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Casa cottage is a wonderful place, a heritage villa  tucked away in a quiet lane in a very central location. 

The staff is very friendly and helpful. I always stay here. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Fabulous! ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Absolutely love the place, great team! 
Very accommodating. 
Spick and span! So we‚Äôll maintained. 
Quiet and serene! 

10/10 '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Horrible Experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The room given was a Deluxe room. Clean and nice , but hit water was not available.
The breakfast I did not have but the layout was good 
A security guard actually cooks for you and sets the table ..maybe he is the caretaker.
The room was not cleaned after day one even when I left the key ..
The linen was Shabby and worn out.
Towel and quilt reminded me of a Hostel where old worn out things are recycled .
The bathroom has a bucket and a heritage era shower.
I also got complementary packet of Condoms left over by guest occupying the room before me.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Casual Homestay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Old worn out towels , No frills house rather than a hotel.
The staff is also quite basic like domestic help not very professional.

The area is great with a small garden and sitting Area which is also their place to eat ( can't call it a restaurant)

No one helps with luggage I had to carry heavy bags from a steep stair from the first floor.

The room was average old style but quaint .
Toilet shower etc are all worn out and small plastic bucket was given.

It's more of backpackers kind of crowd and it's REALLY dead silent there...
No room service or any phone to contact room service....

TV does not work it's like a small picture frame on the wall..
No wardrobe or anything just a couple of hangers to put your clothes...

Breakfast was canned juices , dirty plates , Burnt Dosa made on a Tawa I think served with watery Sambhar and something which looked like a Chutney.
A microwave is given in this area and you can heat the sambar there.

Water is RO water really No bottled water ...

Ants on plates broken jugs ...

The good part is it's a serene nice quite place where you can enjoy your golden days or probably if you are sick of a hectic life then it's a nice break.
"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Family friendly and pet friendly‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Relaxed ambient and hygenic with pleasant staff. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'A truly unique experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Casa cottage is a glimpse of the past in the middle of a very busy, modern city.  Sitting in the garden with breakfast or an afternoon tea, you would not imagine the hustle just around the corner.  The rooms are still of the century old flavour, but contain all you need - great lounge area, nice bathroom and bedroom, and a useful kitchen area.  The staff are very helpful and friendly, and will happily assist with whatever your needs are.  And the location is great.  Just 15 minutes walk and you are in the city centre near lots of great items - shopping, restaurants, metro station and the beautiful Cubbon Park where you can walk and relax with a picnic. '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Underwhelming and mismanaged‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I had booked this place for our first anniversary. The person on the phone confirmed that he had "made a note" for our booking and that the room will be upgraded when we arrive. Also, we had paid extra for a package with "guaranteed upgrade" and "choice of movies".

1. Room decor was not done despite informing them twice.
2. When we arrived we were given the usual room and told that the upgrade is "subject to availability".
3. When we asked for the movie package, they kept saying that it is "just cartoons" on DVD so we won't be needing it. This movie package never arrived.

Later, they did upgrade us to a Suite room (with decor etc) around 10pm. That is the reason that I have given three stars instead of one. However, by that time we had already wasted half of our stay dealing with these inefficiencies and waiting for things to be delivered. I had booked Sheraton because I wanted everything to be perfect on this day. However, our anniversary experience was completely ruined because of the miscommunication between their staff members.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'LoVe this hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Such a great hotel. exceptional service. "}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not good, not clean, flush was not working, Service was poor'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very quiet surrounding and we enjoyed it'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Absolutely not worth 6k a night‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I was thoroughly disappointed with this property. Happened to stay here a week ago as I was in the area on work.
1. On my arrival at around 10:45pm, I requested the front desk for a kathi roll and he said the kitchen was closed so instead he would send me a bento box to my room with food that was served in the buffet. He also decided to tell me how great Bangalore is in terms of weather, etc but the worst in terms of food. I dont think a front desk staff should strike such conversation with a guest who is from Bangalore. Speaking negatively about the city, isn't going to get you anywhere. I waited in the room for close to an hour and the so called bento box never arrived despite me calling and reminding them. Eventually had to step out for dinner.
2. The room is just about average. The bathroom however badly needs to be refurnished. There is no health faucet and instead a mug full of calcium deposit. I have never seen a mug in a 4 star hotel and it is beyond me why they don't have a health faucet when they're catering to business travellers from all over the world. The walls of the bathroom have leaks which are plastered in a very shabby manner and not even repainted.
3. During my check-out the lady at the front desk very matter-of-factly says she doesn't have change. No apology, no question about how I enjoyed me stay, nothing. Not even the slightest attempt to check with the restaurant which was just 40ft away from her.

I would however like to thank the security who helped me with my luggage and the housekeeping for cleaning my room when I needed it to be cleaned. 

In my 48 hour booking that I had there, I probably spent all of 7 hours at the hotel because I was absolutely disgusted and disappointed with the property. Definitely wouldn't recommend this hotel to anyone."}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel with good service and hospitality‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I stayed with my family in this hotel during December 2019. It was the day after Christmas and hence the hotel was decorated. The hotel had ample parking, service was good and the rooms were spacious. Its a business hotel and hence gym facility was available. If you are planning to visit the bangalore city then this hotel might not be suitable. Free breakfast was provided and was good. The roads outside the hotel are also not busy and can be used for morning and evening walks. The swimming pool was also good and was cleaned regularly.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Overall good experience but expensive‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Tariff is on the higher side looking a the services and the location'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Washrooms are transparent from room ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I suggest to check n go before booking

'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Rude and unwelcoming receptionist ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We had a fairly poor experience at this hotel. This was down to the bad communication of the rude, unhelpful and unwelcoming receptionists (specially the older lady and to a lesser extent another man). Every time I'd ask a question she'd pick up the phone. She was more interested in telling us when we had to leave than helping. The wifi doesn't work if you can't receive an SMS so slightly awkward for international travellers who can't use mobiles/ or anyone wanted to use a laptop etc. The room was clean but the hot water was only available between two hours. The bell boys in the green shirts were all very friendly though. Better options on Cottonpet main road. "}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Clean hotel, tough location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The hotel staff and the room's cleanliness were excellent--each day, I saw staff cleaning walls, floors, windows..  They were very helpful with connecting to wifi and helping with any concern.   So, the hotel itself was actually a nice, quiet, and affordable place to stay.  The only difficulty was the location--although it is near the train station, it is actually surrounded by 6 lanes of busy, one-way traffic, making it challenging for me to walk to nearby restaurants, general stores,  etc.  To go even just one kilometer, one has to rely on rick-shaw drivers, who often hesitated with the ride, given the series of looping one-way lanes of traffic..  As one who is used to walking to a metro to explore a city, this location was a bit challenging and even isolating at times.  However, if you have a car, just need to do work/business from your room, and/or don't mind the garage-cafe food, then the location would be fine."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very nice place to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was a pleasant experience for us to stay in Sheetal Residency and we are very happy to recommend to others also.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent Value for Money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed one night at this hotel. The room was very big, clean, with comfy beds. Bathroom also spacious and clean. Even though we booked without A/C, there was one in the room.
Only downside: you get limited WIFI of 500MB per person, which is a bit too less if you need it. Reception personnel could be a bit more friendly, although professional and helpful.'}], 'price': '1,210', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/545/545291/545291_15042117500027006993.jpg?ca=13&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '20m¬≤', 'amenities': ['City view', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Hair dryer', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Desk'], 'city': 'Bangalore', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/sheetal-residency/hotel/bangalore-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=-1&los=1&searchrequestid=9cf30099-dca1-4d4a-ad80-c7c15f4f0a14'}

It was difficult to explain the staff that I don‚Äôt have any problem with the room but I did not get what I pair for. Though the room was changed after they had  some internal discussion.
Seems like they take every customer thinking the same way. It was mentioned in package of welcome drink but was never offered instead was given 2 extremely small bottle that we were supposed to utilise them during entire stay as above that it was chargeable. The changed room so called Delux room was not having cleaned linens. Seems the last customer ate some thing and there were fresh marks of vegetables. They changed the bedsheet but for blanket/quilt they did not have the fresh covers hence was asked to adjust.
Coming on to the restaurant experience, they did not have the tandoor working as there were not many visitors so from that big menu only limited choices were there. Only positive side was the morning breakfast which i can say is the takeaway for my entire stay.

{'Location': 'Marathahalli, Bangalore, India', 'overall_rating': '7.8', 'Name': 'Tristar Service Apartments', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not worth the money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not worth the money unless you require a kitchen'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Calm, sweet room with everything I needed‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice space, small kitchen with everything I needed. Really good food in the restaurant. Thank you!'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Interiors.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Interiors for service apartment were of low quality. Cleaning was done only after the reminder. Bathroom doors not closing due to wooden expansion.  Side walls were bulging due to water leakages from Bathrooms. Overall not recommended compared to decent mid range hotels for the same price.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Satisfied yet had some minor issues‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I stayed in a basic studio room (Room no. 21). The room was spacious. It had nice kitchenette. It was well lit. I specifically liked the desk and chair provided which was comfortable to work using my laptop. The staff were courteous and helpful.  Public areas like entrance, reception, stairways and lobbies were clean.
I just have two minor issues to point out:
1. I had to bath quickly (< 5 mins) as I wished to use hot water. Whenever I used the bathroom (in the mornings and evenings on all days), I found the hot water to be available only for about 5 minutes. 
2.  Breakfast starts at 7:30 am. I went on Jan 9th at 7:40 am. They took ~10 mins to serve my order (Upma and Omlette). One of the staff who served me did not inform that Chole Batura was also available in the menu. I came to know this from another staff who mentioned it while serving a nearby table (I heard him just after I started having my Upma).'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'I love Tristar‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Tristar just has something special about it. Perhaps it‚Äôs the atypical light colour furniture, the well arranged rooms and the large windows throughout the property which gives it a nice feel of a ‚Äòhome away from home‚Äô. I hope that the style withstands any major renovation. The staff is always friendly and welcoming which is why I stay always stay at Tristar when I visit Bangalore. One of my previous feedback was that the bathroom needs a bit of a clean. Believe it or not, on my next check in the staff remembered my feedback and addressed what I pointed out. All was perfect.  Who else does take customer feedback so seriously? Tristar does!'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'I felt like home‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We reached a bit earlier as our flight was early in the morning and Tristar let us check in a bit earlier as a welcome gesture. The rooms were just flawless, clean and exactly what we needed. The kitchen had everything we needed. It just felt like a home. The room gets a lot of sunlight and the beds are very comfortable. We loved the breakfast served there, it was freshly made eggs to order, dosa, aloo paratha (something new everyday) so we always had something to look forward to. The place feels very American and welcoming. I would love to stay there again.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'cleanliness of the room, kitchenette and toilet including bedsheets and toiletries is disappointing ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I have noticed that if a room is booked using Agoda then the rooms that are allocated by the hotel, are the most bad ones from amongst all rooms available . Agoda should assess what is their credibility with the hotels and ask why such poor rooms are being allocated to travellers routed through their portal .'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Great location, Spacious, Great Value‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Located on 100 Ft road which offers easy connectivity with plenty of dining and shopping options around.
The rooms are spacious and clean. Kitchenette has all necessary equipment for minimal cooking. Restaurant downstairs offers simple and tasty food at great rates. The staff are courteous, responsive and helpful.
The property itself is a bit old and the fixtures show their age. However that should not distract from all the positives of the place. 
Highly recommended and will definitely consider again for  future trips to Bangalore'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location, friendly staff but very run down‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I booked this place based on my memory of it being a really nice serviced apartment from some years ago.  The staff was very helpful and friendly and the location is great but  I was very disappointed by how run down it was. The doors and kitchen cabinets didn't close properly, most of the bulbs didn't work or stopped working during my stay. The bathroom in particular was really disgusting - with no exhaust, flickering lights which also eventually stopped working, rotten wooden frames and dirty moldy walls. 
Considering Tristar costs more than the brand new boutique apartments right next to it (when i was making the booking), the management really needs to renovate or at least give the rooms a face lift if they want repeat custom."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great location, warm-hearted staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I stayed at Tri-star for about a month. The staff at front desk was very helpful in check-in and helped me book a taxi as I took a late flight. The 2-bedroom itself is spacious. The 2nd time the room didn't have good cable TV and there was noise from the street; we asked for a previous room, which was quieter and looked vacant at the time (as were several other rooms on the same floor), but for some reason the staff couldn't give it to us - which was disappointing. So overall, the 1st time there was great and the 2nd time was so-so. "}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Wrong room + two times waken up by mistake‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We stayed at the Melange Astris Hotel 2 nights. I got a room that was different from the one I booked, at the ground floor with a unique window with blinds but no curtain. What makes you cannot have day light and room privacy in the same time.  I was tired after travelling, and did realize that major drawback too late. Moreover, on the 2nd morning, we've been waken up at 8 am by the hotel staff for a towel we did NOT requested, and again at 8.30 am for a second towel !!
I expressed clearly I was upset. But got no apologizes so far.
The swimming pool use was forbidden without any rational explanations.

After check out, we let our luggages at the Hotel because we had a late flight at night, and once back at the hotel at the end of afternoon asked very politely to have a room for changing clothes. We got it ! this was the lobby's toilet !!!

Very disapointed then !

Despite all this, the hotel has refused to refund any part of my payment. Staff were polite and very courteous.

Very close to Manyata Tech Park (about 10mins walking).
Hotel is located at a very convenient and busy location (Nagavara Crossing). One can easily find shops/ATM nearby.
Elements Mall is also nearby (about 5-6mins walking).
The only con about the location is the access road, that is rigged with potholes. {'Location': '#412/353, BB Main Road, Yelahanka Old Town, Devanahalli, Bangalore, India, 560064', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Treebo Trend Rotano Suites', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': "Worst Hotel Ever, Don't Trust Photos/Reviews/Star Ratings‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'Worst Hotel Ever! Don' t trust the good reviews!!!!!
Since, I didn't know much around Yelahanka, This was the only hotel which had good star rating in that area( My First mistake of trusting the reviews). 
1. The hotel is not at all like how it is showed on the photographs in any website. The rooms were small, smelling and worst
2. The day we reached the location, there was no Parking! The mentioned parking was a small One/Two car space right outside the building and very close to the main road(I parked my car risking oncoming traffic and others scratching it)
3. There is no facility to Swipe your debit/credit card! The receptionist is rude and doesn't respond or give alternative options to pay at the hotel. He just said "Machine is not working, Pay cash/Gpay or leave". He is dumb! No response! 
4. Rooms were damn small, I can literally hear what my neighbor room folks are talking, whenever they turn on switches, i can literally hear everything! 
5. AC's doesn't give cooling at all. Even at 17 degree's set, It doesn't cool up at all. 
6. The bedsheets were torn, and No pillow covers to the pillows! Pillows and Blanket had stains and once you sleep on it! You will start feeling itching sensation! We suffered a lot. 
7. Bathrooms are the WORST. The washbasin Faucet was literally moving around. If you want to open Tap for water, You need to use two hands. The same thing with hot/cold water tap! You need to put pressure to turn nobs! The bath room lock is so tall and tight, You need one hand to push it inside to put the lock. 
The toilet seats were broken, and inside liner was cracked and one piece was broken! I was scared if it breaks! 
8. Once the AC is ON, It throws some foul smell (One from Sewage) it irritates the hell out of you! 
9. The curtains were dusty, with spiderwebs, They are so thin, that day light breaks in easily and hits right on your face. There was some construction outside, and they knocking everyone morning will wake u up by 5AM!
